snippet.title: Boeing Could Test Flight 747-8 Next Week
snippet.description:
Boeing Could Test Flight 747-8 Next Week
By TheStreet Staff 01:30 AM EST 02/04/10
Boeing is set to test flight its delayed 747-8 jumbo jet, the newest version of the 747 aircraft, a report says.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10674066/1/boeing-could-test-flight-747-8-next-week.html

snippet.title: Boeing Inks China Deals
snippet.description:
Boeing Inks China Deals
By Ted Reed 09:30 AM EST 03/08/11
Boeing signed deals with two Chinese carriers at the Hong Kong Air Show.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11035182/1/boeing-inks-china-deals.html

snippet.title: Boeing Loses Five 747-8 Orders as Cargo Slump Continues
snippet.description:
Boeing Loses Five 747-8 Orders as Cargo Slump Continues
By Ted Reed 12:11 PM EDT 11/03/11
Boeing said Emirates will now take ten 747 freighters, and convert five orders to 777s.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11299219/1/boeing-loses-five-747-8-orders-as-cargo-slump-continues.html

snippet.title: Boeing's 747-8 Freighter Leaves Factory
snippet.description:
Boeing's 747-8 Freighter Leaves Factory
By Joseph Woelfel 01:01 AM EST 11/13/09
Boeing said the first 747-8 freighter was towed out of its Everett, Wash., factory and will begin preparations for a flight test.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10626243/1/boeings-747-8-freighter-leaves-factory.html

snippet.title: Boeing to Roll Out New 747
snippet.description:
Boeing to Roll Out New 747
By Rob Lenihan 03:50 PM EST 11/15/05
The company has $5 billion in orders for the plane.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10253036/1/boeing-to-roll-out-new-747.html

snippet.title: Boeing Ascends After First 747-8 Flight
snippet.description:
Boeing Ascends After First 747-8 Flight
By Ted Reed 10:12 AM EDT 03/21/11
Boeing expects the first commercial flight of its upgraded 747 to occur late this year.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11052784/1/boeing-ascends-after-first-747-8-flight.html

snippet.title: Boeing Lengthens With New 747
snippet.description:
Boeing Lengthens With New 747
By Ted Reed 10:24 AM EST 02/14/11
Boeing rolled out a new variation of the 747 in a bid to compete with the A380.

snippet.title: Boeing to Take $1 Billion Charge
snippet.description:
Boeing to Take $1 Billion Charge
By Ted Reed 09:47 AM EDT 10/06/09
Boeing said Tuesday that it will take a $1 billion pre-tax charge against its 747-8 freighter program due to delays.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10607667/1/boeing-to-take-1-billion-charge.html

snippet.title: Boeing Details Overseas Orders
snippet.description:
Boeing Details Overseas Orders
By TSC Staff 12:18 PM EST 01/03/07
The company signs deals worth more than $7 billion.

snippet.title: Boeing Can't Like World Air Cargo Trends
snippet.description:
Boeing Can't Like World Air Cargo Trends
By Ted Reed 07:00 AM EDT 11/01/11
Boeing is starting deliveries of the 747-8 freighter, the largest civilian aircraft it has ever built, just as cargo shipping slumps.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11294427/1/boeing-cant-like-world-air-cargo-trends.html
